scripts.dev:test:h5: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=H5 node ./wx-build.mjs dev --mode development h5
scripts.dev:test:wx: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-WEIXIN node ./wx-build.mjs dev --mode development mp-weixin
scripts.dev:test:ali: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-ALIPAY node ./wx-build.mjs dev --mode development mp-alipay
scripts.build:test:h5: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=H5 node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode development h5
scripts.build:test:wx: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-WEIXIN node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode development mp-weixin
scripts.build:test:ali: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-ALIPAY node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode development mp-alipay
scripts.build:pro:h5: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=H5 node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode production h5
scripts.build:pro:wx: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-WEIXIN node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode production mp-weixin
scripts.build:pro:ali: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-ALIPAY node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode production mp-alipay
scripts.build:release:h5: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=H5 node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode release h5
scripts.build:release:wx: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-WEIXIN node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode release mp-weixin
scripts.build:release:ali: cross-env VITE_UNI_PLATFORM=MP-ALIPAY node ./wx-build.mjs build --mode release mp-alipay
